statements: SELECT * FROM reinforcement_learning_experiments
SELECT experiment_id, hyperparameters, start_time FROM reinforcement_learning_experiments
SELECT * FROM reinforcement_learning_experiments WHERE experiment_id = 100
SELECT * FROM reinforcement_learning_experiments WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT experiment_id, configurations FROM reinforcement_learning_experiments ORDER BY experiment_id DESC
SELECT * FROM reinforcement_learning_experiments WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_id, start_time, end_time FROM reinforcement_learning_experiments WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reinforcement_learning_experiments WHERE configurations->'model' = 'DQN';
SELECT experiment_id, hyperparameters FROM reinforcement_learning_experiments WHERE end_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT experiment_id, configurations FROM reinforcement_learning_experiments WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters;
SELECT learning_rate, optimizer FROM hyperparameters WHERE batch_size > 32;
SELECT id, batch_size, optimizer FROM hyperparameters WHERE learning_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5;
SELECT * FROM experiment_configurations WHERE reward_function = 'accuracy';
SELECT experiment_name, epoch_count FROM experiment_configurations ORDER BY epoch_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters WHERE learning_rate > 0.01 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, epoch_count FROM experiment_configurations WHERE reward_function = 'sparse' ORDER BY epoch_count ASC;
SELECT id, optimizer FROM hyperparameters WHERE batch_size >= 32 ORDER BY id;
SELECT experiment_name, epoch_count, reward_function FROM experiment_configurations WHERE epoch_count < 50 ORDER BY reward_function;
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters WHERE optimizer = 'adam' ORDER BY learning_rate DESC, batch_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters WHERE learning_rate > 0.01
SELECT experiment_id, batch_size FROM hyperparameters
SELECT optimizer FROM experiment_configs WHERE environment_id = 1
SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT AVG(learning_rate) FROM hyperparameters
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters WHERE learning_rate > 0.001
SELECT experiment_id, optimizer FROM experiment_configs WHERE experiment_id = 1
SELECT experiment_id, start_time, status FROM experiments ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT experiment_id, learning_rate FROM hyperparameters WHERE batch_size > 32
SELECT * FROM experiment_configs WHERE optimizer = 'adam' AND num_epochs >= 10
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters;
SELECT experiment_id, learning_rate FROM hyperparameters ORDER BY learning_rate DESC;
SELECT model_name, reward_function FROM experiment_configurations WHERE epochs > 100;
SELECT model_name FROM experiment_configurations WHERE reward_function = 'mean_squared_error';
SELECT result_id, reward FROM experiment_results ORDER BY reward DESC, steps ASC;
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters ORDER BY learning_rate DESC, batch_size ASC
SELECT experiment_id, reward_function, epochs FROM experiment_configurations WHERE model_name = 'CNN'
SELECT experiment_id, learning_rate, batch_size, exploration_rate FROM hyperparameters WHERE learning_rate > 0.01 AND batch_size < 128
SELECT model_name, layers, neurons_per_layer FROM model_architecture WHERE layers >= 3 ORDER BY neurons_per_layer DESC
SELECT result_id, experiment_id, reward FROM experiment_results WHERE result_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM Hyperparameters;
SELECT experiment_id, learning_rate, batch_size FROM Hyperparameters;
SELECT environment_name, algorithm_name FROM ExperimentConfigurations WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Experiments WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT experiment_id, accuracy, loss FROM ModelMetrics ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hyperparameters ORDER BY learning_rate DESC, num_layers
SELECT experiment_id, environment_name FROM ExperimentConfigurations WHERE algorithm_name='DQN' AND reward_function='Sparse'
SELECT experiment_id, start_time, end_time, status FROM Experiments WHERE status='Completed' ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT experiment_id, accuracy, loss FROM ModelMetrics WHERE accuracy > 0.8 AND loss < 0.5
SELECT experiment_id, LENGTH(weight) as weight_size FROM ModelWeights ORDER BY weight_size DESC
